name: weather
description: Current weather for any location using Open-Meteo. No API key. Use when the user asks for weather, temperature, or conditions in a city or place.

tools.name: weather_current
tools.description: Get current weather for a location (city name, place, or 'here' for a generic check). Use when the user asks 'what's the weather', 'weather in Denver', 'temperature in London', or similar. Returns temperature, conditions, humidity, wind.

location.description: City or place name (e.g. 'Denver', 'London', 'Tokyo'). Required unless coordinates provided.

latitude.description: Latitude (optional; used with longitude instead of location)
